card.title: Stretch
card.text: Hi there! You should stretch and warm up before beginning any exercises.

voice.intro: Hi there! Let's stretch before beginning our exercisesâ€¦
How many minutes do you want to exercise?

card.title: Stretch routine
card.text: OK, we'll begin with a neck roll for fifteen seconds.

voice.intro:
OK, we'll begin with a neck roll for fifteen seconds. Starting now.

<break time="10s"/> 
Five <break time="1s"/> 
Four <break time="1s"/> 
Three <break time="1s"/> 
Two <break time="1s"/> 
One <break time="1s"/>

Next, place your right hand on the back of your neck, then pull down on your elbow with your left hand. <break time="10s"/> Now switch sides. <break time="10s"/>.

Next, interlock your fingers in front of you, face your palms outward and slowly raise your arms above your head <break time="10s"/>. Now, interlock your fingers behind you and roll your shoulders <break time="10s"/>.

Next, plant your feet then place your hands on your hips and slowly rotate side to side <break time="10s"/>.

Next, lift your right knee up in front of you then rotate it out to your right before bringing your leg back to a resting position <break time="10s"/>. Now switch sides <break time="10s"/>.

Next, place your right hand on a wall and hold your right leg behind you with your left hand <break time="10s"/>. Now switch sides <break time="10s"/>.

Next, lean forward and reach for your toes without bending your legs <break time="10s"/>. Hold it <break time="10s"/>.

Next, place your hands on a wall and step one foot backward. Leave that foot firmly planted flat on the floor as you gently stretch your calf muscle <break time="10s"/>. Now switch sides <break time="10s"/>.
voice.prompt: Loosened up? Next we'll do a little warm-up. Say "warm up" to begin.
Great job! Say "exercise" when you're ready to start.

card.title: Done
card.text: Great job! Say stop to finish.

voice.prompt: Great job! Say stop to finish.
